review: We love it and we run all our apps through the Apple TV. The nice thing is the box runs 1080p which looks great on our HD TV. The only thing we would like to see is a package vs a price for shows. It's not iTunes where you buy a show at time this is video.  We use our IPad and surf the networks and pop them up on Apple TV it's easy :) Apple rocks and very simple.
